Between 2018-2020, I was a research assistant professor at Toyota Technological Institute at Chicago. Research Fast graph algorithms in different models of computationRobust algorithms against an adaptive adversary Continuous optimization for combinatorial problemsMy work has been supported by an NSF CAREER Award and a Sloan Research Fellowship.
